meanings.sent1: The boychicks played happily in the park.
meanings.sent2: I saw a boychicks running around the playground.
meanings.sent3: The boychicks tried to outdo each other in the game.
meanings.sent4: The boychicks were like little bundles of energy.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the boychicks filled the air with joy.

meanings.definition: A group of young male children.
meanings.sent1: The boychicks walked together to school every day.
meanings.sent2: I heard the boychicks laughing and playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The boychicks formed a secret club in the treehouse.
meanings.sent4: The boychicks resembled a flock of excited birds.
meanings.sent5: The boychicks' chatter echoed through the neighborhood.
